name: places/ChIJ-7LGsK5ZwokR3x9ylDTY1vE
adrFormatAddress: 1293 Broadway, New York, NY 10001, USA

editorialSummary.text: Telecommunications store offering cell phones, wireless plans, accessories & more.

originalText.text: Last week I went into the Verizon store unsure if I was due for a phone upgrade. I was greeted by Paul who was extremely polite and helpful. He explained everything to me about the phones I was interested in, trade in options and any other questions I had. I was on my lunch break, which he did not know, but he had me out the door within 20 minutes, new phone and all. Thanks for the excellent customer service.

text.text: Last week I went into the Verizon store unsure if I was due for a phone upgrade. I was greeted by Paul who was extremely polite and helpful. originalText.text:
I was in the area and discovered this Verizon Corporate store. It is a really beautiful store. The ambiance and its layout offer customer privacy while allowing browsers freedom to roam.

The store is well merchandised offering a myriad of impulse tech gadgets, multiple mobile device brands, etc.

This location seems to be well staffed after all Herald Square is a very busy area.

text.text:
I was in the area and discovered this Verizon Corporate store. It is a really beautiful store. The ambiance and its layout offer customer privacy while allowing browsers freedom to roam.

The store is well merchandised offering a myriad of impulse tech gadgets, multiple mobile device brands, etc.

This location seems to be well staffed after all Herald Square is a very busy area.

originalText.text:
I can not recommend the service!
I went in just before the store closed to get a prepaid sim card. I was aware that it was near the end of opening hours, which is why I asked if it would be better if I came back tomorrow.
Instead of selling me a sim card, the employee wanted to sell me a cell phone and a sim card. I just took the sim card, paid, didn't get a bill and was kicked out pretty quickly. Nothing worked with the sim card except the message that I should call the service hotline. I noticed afterwards that the unfriendly employee took away my actual sim card (dual sim) and did not put it back into the smartphone. Of course, the next day I went back and the manager tells me that the sim card was never activated. Helpfully he tried to activate it, but it did not work. He said the payment process with the credit card did not work, I should pay a new SIM card and start from scratch. I gratefully declined to not have to pay twice. The manager promised me verbally and also showed on the tablet, that it was not paid. So I thought, I do not have a prepaid sim card, my actual sim card was thrown away but at least I have not paid anything.....thought wrong, the money was debited from me! I am not in New York anymore and it is impossible to find a helpful employee on the service hotline........so absolutely no chance to see the money ever again! Prepaid better buy somewhere else to save money!

originalText.text: One of the worst V stores around. They keep on adding you different plans without even letting you clearly. Avoid this place. No professionalism whatsoever. M was just plain awful.

originalText.text:
Rachel, you are the best!
I had troubles with transferring from another carrier, and I was struggling for a few days, she helped me to resolve it ❤️
